about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages cannot be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This bundle includes
  • The special configuration of the “Ellydium” engineering frigate Waz'Got with a fully unlocked development tree and nodes.

Waz'Got weapons:
  • Waz'Dum R6-8 Mk4, R8-12 Mk4 и R11-17 Mk4
  • Th'ak'Len R5-9 Mk4, R8-12 Mk4 и R11-17 Mk4
  • Waz'Gul R8-12 Mk4 and R11-17 Mk4
  • WL13-EL Emitter R5-9 Mk4, R8-12 Mk4 и R11-17 Mk4

Waz'Got active combat modules:
  • Waz'Got battle station R13-17 Mk4
  • Emergency repair station R13-17 Mk4
  • Gravi-wave R7-11 Mk4, R10-14 Mk4 and R13-17 Mk4
  • ‘Patron’ active defence R7-11 Mk4, R10-14 Mk4 and R13-17 Mk4
  • Protective sphere R7-11 Mk4, R10-14 Mk4 and R13-17 Mk4
  • Hull converter R10-14 Mk4 and R13-175 Mk4

Waz'Got modules and modifiers:
  • Production optimization R5-9 Mk4, R8-12 Mk4 and R11-17 Mk4
  • Regenerator shield R5-9 Mk4, R8-12 Mk4 and R11-17 Mk4
  • Engineering regenerator R10-14 Mk4 and R13-17 Mk4
  • Coolant distributor R9-13 Mk4 and R12-17 Mk4

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Unique ship decor “Astromechanic”
  • Unique title “Evolution Master”
  • Sticker set “Pin-up”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

The latest state-of-the-art engineering frigate “Waz'Got” is the quintessence of scientific thought and the result of the collective work of all the staff and scientists of the Ellydium Theta station. The incredible capabilities of the frigate will provide allies with reliable support in the rear and victory in battle even over superior enemy forces.

The technologies used in special and active modules are a further development of advanced scientific theory developed under the guidance of Dr Matthew Gilmore and Conrad Dimeni. The ship's unique feature allows it to use the wrecks of dead ships to enhance its own power.

We remind you that a Premium license grants all pilots greater rewards for each battle. The pilot, who receives a premium license from the Command, quickly masters new ships due to increased experience gain in battle. And when the battle ends, pilots with a premium license have two bonus attempts at trophy search — this means that the chance of getting new unique equipment becomes higher!

When purchasing multiple DLCs, the time for premium licenses is cumulative.

name: Star Conflict: Waz'got. Deluxe Version

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Star Conflict: Waz'got. Deluxe Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz, Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 6 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 6 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
